item.title: ./init_blog.sh
item.description: I’ll post some actual content here in the near future, but in the meantime I’m posting this to show some things I learned while making this website and showcase the CSS that turns Markdown into HTML in this section of the website. It was pretty hard to get this site working. First I had to build a sufficiently good-looking website from the ground up and write responsive CSS. After like two pages of HTML it was already too complex due to ⚠️ code reuse ⚠️.
